topics.title: Full & Easy installing instruction of ZeroNet in Linux Mint
topics.body:
run following in terminal:

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install build-essential python-dev python-pip git
sudo pip install pyzmq gevent msgpack-python
git clone https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet.git
cd ZeroNet
python ./zeronet.py

and then, open 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr
in browser, enjoy!
( tested in Linux Mint, I think in Ubuntu or Debian  also works)

1@60.body:
run following in terminal:


sudo apt-get update

sudo apt-get install build-essential python-dev python-pip git

sudo pip install pyzmq gevent msgpack-python

git clone https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet.git

cd ZeroNet

python ./zeronet.py


and then, open 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr
in browser, enjoy!

( tested in Linux Mint, I think in Ubuntu or Debian  also works)
